title: Faizan Mumtaz
description: is a Software engineer with more than 6 month of experience in web development. I completed the degree of BSCS from UNiversity of Management & Technology(UMT). I have extensive experience designing front-end adn converting PSD files into webpages.My areas of expertise include HTML5, CSS3, SASS/SCSS, Bootstrap,JavaScript, Angular, Angular Material & Ionic Framework.
